name: Time Traversal
description:
A short puzzle platformer made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2.

You play as a bot, whose  goal is to put all the energy cubes into their energy bars, so as to progress to the next level. But here's the catch, you cannot reach some parts of the level. For those areas you have to reverse the time for specific objects, to make them work like moving platforms.

HOW TO PLAY:
A/D to move
W to jump
Press E while near the gate button to open the gate
Click on either on the player or the energy cube to start recording their positions
Then click on the center rewind the object in time
Avoid the red enemies
If you mess up you can always restart the level by clicking the restart button on top right corner
